TypeSignature.Value: public ref class BinaryPrimitives abstract sealed
.class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit BinaryPrimitives extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Reads bytes as primitives with specific endianness.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
Use these helpers when you need to read specific endianness.

MemberSignature.Value: public: static double ReadDoubleBigEndian(ReadOnlySpan<System::Byte> source);

static member ReadDoubleBigEndian : ReadOnlySpan<byte> -> double

Docs.param: The read-only span to read.
Docs.summary: Reads a from the beginning of a read-only span of bytes, as big endian.
Docs.returns: The big endian value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
Reads exactly 8 bytes from the beginning of the span.

Docs.param: The value to reverse.
Docs.summary: Reverses a primitive value by performing an endianness swap of the specified value, which effectively does nothing for a .
Docs.returns: The passed-in value, unmodified.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This method effectively does nothing and was added only for consistency.

Docs.param: The read-only span of bytes to read.
When this method returns, contains the value read out of the read-only span of bytes, as big endian.
Docs.summary: Reads a from the beginning of a read-only span of bytes, as big endian.
Docs.returns: if the span is large enough to contain a ; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks
Reads exactly 8 bytes from the beginning of the span.
